page.title: 18Games we play in Pin Green.
page.content: We play{organised games}such as {rounders}which is a summer game for boys and girls.It is played with a bat and ball.You hit the ball and run round some posts.In winter boys play {football}with 10 players and a goalie. There are defenders, midfielders and forwards.The midfielders run all over the field and the forwards are meant to score the goals.Defenders try to stop the ball going into the goal. Girls play{netball}in winter,with 7 in a team;2 shoot the ball into the net. { At playtime,}we play{"Run-across". Someone is "on-it",touches someone else and that person is "on-it".We also play{"Queenie's ball"}where the person "on-it" has to find who has the ball.Other playground games are{relay- {running,skipping,hoop-rolling,run-out, {and stick-in-the-mud. ,
